ygData.subject: Re: On a note of mistakes...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noticed that too since the patch... I think it s a bug more than anything. I does not say the root spell is resisted but the target breaks out of it in
ygData.messageBody:
I have noticed that too since the patch... I think it's a bug more than
anything. I does not say the root spell is resisted but the target breaks
out of it in a second or two.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Murawski [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 7:19 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On a note of mistakes...


From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>

Hail

Well I think I'm actually gonna keep my guy with the Quellious god. Thanks
for the info about wisdom.

I have a question though. I was on kerra (wisp) isle fighting wisps and I
was the 'rooter'. The first few, I would root and a few seconds later they
would be moving. Then after those first few, when I rooted, it sticked and
they never moved the whole time.

I've seen the root spell also not work when I'm trying to get a gnoll that
is running away in BB but most of the time it does.

Does root have a random duration or something or sometimes doesn't take
affect?
Has anyone else have these troubles?

Azboklin the enchanter (lv10 just yesterday)
